Class GeoUtils

it.univpm.marcolini.util.GeoUtils
public class GeoUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    • getArea

      public static java.lang.Double getArea​(GeoPoint[] coord)
      calculate the area of the BoundingBox
      Parameters:

      Returns:
